{1: 'ThemeEnable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory32.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Outer rim survey completed. No ambushes confirmed.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'And the route inside?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Liv's not here, so we have limited data collection capabilities. Nothing to do now but to wait for Kamui.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I just thought of the time inside the shop, picking the plushies with Liv...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'That sheep plushie, it felt like Liv... it had that same, warm feeling.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Sometimes in battle, I feel like it is Liv who stays in the back that shines the brightest.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'When I first became the leader of this squad, I might have chosen Liv because of that almost blinding and warm aura of hers.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "If I remember correctly, Liv is the only one of us who's been awarded with an honorary medal of the highest rank.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I trust that, for someone like her, she'd know what to do in this situation.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'd think so too.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Kamui's back.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Oh, done with calling me "that Strike Hawk guy" now?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'What are the results?', 4: '3'}

{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'The entrance is quite small. You can divide the Corrupted there into two groups, one patrolling in and out the entrance, the other wandering randomly around the entrance outside.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'All things considered, infiltration seems to be the most efficient option.', 4: '1'}
